Update: Cinematic Cut-ins v1.1.6

‚ú® New Features
- Advanced Formula Trigger: Added a new trigger type that allows for detailed condition settings using custom logic (e.g., d[0] == d[1]). This enables full support for systems with unique critical hit rules or specific dice combinations.
- Text Support in Variations: You can now specify separate Main/Sub text for each image variation. This allows for context-specific messages (e.g., displaying "NICE!" for a normal hit variation and "PERFECT!" for a critical hit variation).
- Resource Trigger Modes: Resource triggers are no longer limited to dropping below a value. Added a "Mode" selection to support Increase (Above threshold) conditions.

üêõ Bug Fixes
- Voting Sound Sync: Fixed an issue where the participation confirmation sound during All-Out Attack voting was not playing correctly for other players.
- Ghost Triggers: Fixed a bug where deleting the last trigger rule would cause it to reappear.
